name: Aramis Holiday Flats

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed for a week during the Christmas holidays.
reviews.title: Felt like locals - excellent apartment, great hosts

reviews.text: LOCATION: On the south end of the medieval core, the apartments are easy walking to everything you'd want to see as a tourist, yet just far enough away that we felt we were staying where the locals really live. It's an easy 10 minute walk from the train station or you can catch a quick cab ride. There are bakeries, a butcher, a grocery store and an excellent laundromat all within steps of the building - just about as convenient as it gets.
reviews.title: Perfect home away from home in Bruges

description: The Aramis property is an 18th-century stylish house entirely renovated into 6 elegant and inviting apartments, located a few minutes from all of Bruges' best attractions. The famous Museums, the romantic canals and beautiful churches are just a short stroll away. Around the corner you'll find the open space of the Minnewaterpark, the enchanting Lake of Love, and the 'world-Heritage Beguinage'. The Aramis apartment has a pleasant living room with a sitting and dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, one generous bedroom with fitted wardrobes. The bathroom with white and blue tiles has a trendy shower, heated towel rails, hairdryer and large mirrors. There are also very comfortable sleeping facilities in the sitting area of the living room in each flat. Amenities include cable-TV, CD-DVD player, bed and bath and kitchen linen. Free Wi-Fi. The non-smoking holiday apartments can be rented by the week, midweek or weekend, min stay 3 nights. Special rates/longer stays. Railway station = 10min walk.
